sr.VERIFICATION-ACCORDION1-TITLE: Zašto moram da potpišem ugovor o posredovanju?
sr.VERIFICATION-ACCORDION2-CONTENT:
Prednosti City Expert kompanije za kupce:

  • Najbolja prezentacija nekretnina na tržištu - profesionalne fotografije, video, pogled od 360°, interaktivni plan prostorija i detaljne informacije o nekretnini.
  • Sigurnost - sve nekretnine na sajtu su proverene: imaju urednu dokumentaciju i mogu da se prometuju.
  • Kompletna i personalizovana usluga licenciranih agenata prodaje i podrška tima advokata:
    1. Agent Vam daje savet oko prave cene i vodi pregovore o kupovini.
    2. Agent Vam objašnjava ceo proces prodaje i vodi Vas kroz isti.
    3. Za kreditne kupce, agent preporučuje banku i organizuje sastanke sa bankama.
    4. Agent Vam šalje spisak celokupne dokumentacije za pravljenje predugovora i ugovora.
    5. Naš tim advokata učestvuje u sastavljanju predugovora i ugovora.
    6. Agent prosleđuje dokumentaciju notaru i zakazuje termin overe.
    7. Ako želite, agent može da prisustvuje overi ugovora kod notara.
    8. Štedimo Vam vreme i novac jer pribavljamo list nepokretnosti iz Katastra za Vas, našeg kupca, na naš račun.

Cena usluge: 1,9% sa uključenim PDV-om

Provizija se naplaćuje samo u slučaju realizacije kupovine preko našeg servisa i obračunava u odnosu na kupoprodajnu cenu.
sr.VERIFICATION-ACCORDION3-CONTENT:
City Expert poslovnice i radno vreme

Ugovor o posredovanju možete da potpišete u City Expert poslovnicama:

  • U Beogradu, u ulici Miše Vujica 2, pon-pet: 09:00 - 20:00 i sub: 10:00 - 18:00.
  • U Novom Sadu, u ulici Kralja Aleksandra 12 (TC Pariski Magazin, I sprat), pon-pet: 10:00 - 18:00.

sr.VERIFICATION-ACCORDION4-CONTENT:
Vreme koje biste potrošili na dolazak u poslovnicu sigurno možete da iskoristite na bolji način. Zato Vam nudimo jedinstvenu priliku da potpišete ugovor o posredovanju onlajn, unošenjem svojih podataka u formular na ovoj strani.

Pre unošenja svojih podataka, neophodno je da pročitate obaveštenja u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka o ličnosti.

Posebno Vas obaveštavamo da u svakom trenutku možete opozvati pristanak za obradu svojih podataka o ličnosti.

Ukoliko ste saglasni sa tekstom ugovora i želite da potpišete ugovor onlajn, unesite sledeće podatke.

Ali, oni poznaju i grad, njegovu infrastrukturu, saobraćaj, ritam… I ta svoja znanja rado će podeiti s vama, bez ikakve zadrške, prikrivanja i tajni. Mi ne želimo da vi samo iznajmite stan, mi želimo da se osećate kao kod kuće, koliko god kratko ili dugo odsedate u njemu. Za nas, nijedan posao nije zaključen dok nismo uvereni da ste zadovoljni svojim izborom stana za iznajmljivanje.

sr.TESTIMONIAL-COMMENT-1: Traženje stana preko City Expert-a pretvorilo je potencijalni stres u zanimaciju, koja je ipak kratko potrajala jer sam stan koji odgovara mojim potrebama pronašla brže nego što sam očekivala. Medijska prezentacija, ljubaznost i profesionalizam zaposlenih, uz dostupnost svih relevantnih informacijama, značajno su ubrzali pronalaženje idealnog doma.
sr.TESTIMONIAL-COMMENT-2: Zadovoljan sam saradnjom sa City Expert-om jer su mi pomogli oko pripremanja dokumentacije i komunikacije sa klijentima. Kako nisam imao puno vremena, ispoštovali su moje želje i omogućili mi da sve završimo u vreme kad meni odgovara. Najbolje od svega je što smo najveći deo posla završili preko telefona!
sr.TESTIMONIAL-COMMENT-3: Zahvaljujući izuzetnoj medijskoj prezentaciji, profesionalizmu celog tima i pravne podrške City Experta, stan sam prodala za mesec dana uz minimum ličnog angažovanja. Sada mi kao kupcu medijska prezentacija nekretnina City Experta koja uz video materijal sadrži i tlocrt omogućava da precizno izdvojim nekretnine u skladu sa mojim zahtevima i potrebama. I ne plaćam proviziju što nije zanemarljiva prednost.
sr.TESTIMONIAL-COMMENT-4: Istog dana kada sam oglasio stan, online agent City Expert-a me je kontaktirao i zakazao upoznavanje sa zainteresovanim zakupcima. Čak i kada su ti zakupci odustali, u toku istog dana su mi zakazali upoznavanje sa novim stanarima. Izdao sam stan u rekordnom roku. Sve pohvale za ovakav profesionalni pristup. Moja topla preporuka za ovu agenciju.
sr.TESTIMONIAL-COMMENT-5: Stan na Dan je prvi izbor onih koji traže komfor i fleksibilnost po odličnim cenama. Svi gosti koje sam do sada imao su unapred znali zašto im se dopadaju moji apartmani. Online prezentacija je tu odigrala glavnu ulogu, jer gosti tačno znaju šta da očekuju.
sr.TESTIMONIAL-COMMENT-6: City Expert je najbolji sajt za pretraživanje stanova sa najboljim alatima za pretragu. Zahvaljujući njima kupio sam novi stan. Call centar je bio veoma precizan i uslužan. Dobio sam vrlo korisne informacije u vezi sa administrativnim procesima. Sam proces pregovora je trajao malo duže, ali sam zahvalan agentima što su stručno vodili pregovore. Sve preporuke.
sr.TESTIMONIAL-COMMENT-7: Želela sam da iznajmim stan sa velikom terasom i parkingom. Zahvaljujući filterima na sajtu uspela sam da za vrlo kratko vreme pronađem stan po mojoj meri. Online prezentacija prikazuje realnu sliku prostora, tako da na samom razgledanju nije bilo neprijatnih iznenađenja. Rado bih vas preporučila svima koji su u potrazi za novim domom.
sr.TESTIMONIAL-COMMENT-8: Sve pohvale! Profesionalizam, ažurnost i ljubaznost! Rezervisala sam stan na dan u centru Novog Sada i sve je bilo baš kao na slikama.

en.ABOUT-US-CX-TEAM-TEXT: We are a full-service online real estate agency. Years of professional experience as a traditional agency helped us to learn, grow and improve our services. In our team, we have experienced real estate agents, IT and marketing experts, photographers, lawyers, and other creative professionals who helped us to be where we are now. Our main goal is to make the entire process of buying, selling or renting a property transparent and efficient.
en.ABOUT-US-MISSION-TEXT: City Expert combines creative marketing solutions, state-of-the-art design and practical experience in the real estate market to help individuals buy, sell, rent or lease their property. We value your time and your money by holding transparency as our core value. Our agents use professional, practical and proven customer-oriented approach. We use innovative technologies to provide accurate and quick information to every individual.
en.ABOUT-US-SUB-HEADER: The first online real estate agency in Serbia
en.ABOUT-US-TRUST-TEXT: It was a long and rocky road from traditional to the online agency. We had to work very hard to successfully digitalize our services. From the very beginning, we earned sympathy and trust from our loyal users and IT professionals. We had over 4500 successful realizations - sold or rented properties, in less than 3 years. We are among top 3 online portals in the country, with 2.5 million of unique visitors and 10 million open pages. In 2017, we earned an award for the best real estate website in Serbia. Our hard work and dedication were recognized and supported by South Central Ventures (Enterprise Innovation Fund – ENIF). With their support and investment, we are continuing to grow, expand and change the world of real estate.
en.ABOUT-US-VISION-TEXT: City Expert is dedicated to becoming the first online real estate agency in Europe. We provide online real estate services and aim to achieve the highest possible standard in the industry. As a people-oriented company, we are taking real estate to the future.
en.ABOUT-US-WHO-WE-ARE-TEXT: We rely on knowledge and experience of traditional real estate agents and use new technologies to improve our services. By introducing the online business model, we speed up the process of buying and selling real estate. We also cut excessive costs and offered our users the lowest commission on the market.

Development and production teams will make an interactive presentation, while our advertising team will promote your property to millions of users. On top of that, your online agent will be there for you for all additional questions.
en.ADD-PROPERTY-LEASE-SECTION-BENEFIT2-TEXT: The online presentation is your best advertisement. The presentation offers a detailed insight into the property. Photographs, video, interactive floor plans, and 360° view serve as a unique virtual tour of the property. They are available 24/7.
en.ADD-PROPERTY-LEASE-SECTION-BENEFIT3-TEXT: We upgraded our search and the way you schedule viewings. We increased agents’ availability by swapping field work for an office. This way we can process more requests during the day and keep the same quality of service. By switching to online business model, we were able to reduce our costs and to offer the lowest commission on the market.
en.ADD-PROPERTY-LEASE-SECTION-BENEFIT4-TEXT: Without agent present at the viewing you can choose the time that fits your schedule. You won’t have to meet your agent after work or on weekends. You will be in touch via phone or email. Thanks to advanced online presentations, your future tenants already know how the property looks like, so you can expect to meet only those who are genuinely interested.
en.ADD-PROPERTY-LEASE-SECTION-BENEFIT5-TEXT: As your future tenants already know what to expect, you can take your time during the viewings and get to know each other. You will both have access to your online agents for all additional questions and all the help you need.
en.ADD-PROPERTY-LEASE-SECTION-BENEFIT6-TEXT: Our online agents have notable experience in the traditional world of real estate. They can help you with price estimation, negotiation with potential tenants, and answer any question you have. The most important part – they are always just one phone call away.

en.ADD-PROPERTY-SELL-SECTION-BENEFIT2-TEXT: Online presentation is your best advertisement. Presentation on our website is an advanced solution for giving a detailed insight into your property. Photos, video, an interactive floor plan, and presentation in 360 ° technology allow buyers to get a real insight into the property as if they saw it live. All this information is available to users 24/7.
en.ADD-PROPERTY-SELL-SECTION-BENEFIT3-TEXT: We improved the search and changed the way you schedule property viewings. We increased the availability by transferring the agents from the field to our offices. We completed the most important task by setting up an advanced online presentation. en.ADD-PROPERTY-SELL-SECTION-TEXT: With our advanced property presentation, online agents’ support, and our entire professional team at your service, you can sell your property on the spot, with the lowest commission on the market. After you fill in the form to add the property, our team will contact you and record every detail of your apartment, house or an office space. We will be there for you from the very beginning to the end, from photo shoots all the way to signing the contracts.

en.ADD-PROPERTY-SHORTLEASE-SECTION-BENEFIT3: All short-term rentals are shown on a city map, so your guests can easily find accommodation at the location they prefer. To customize the search guests use filters to easily find even the most specific rentals, like a house in the suburbs, a studio in the city center, or a float house where parties are allowed.
en.ADD-PROPERTY-SHORTLEASE-SECTION-BENEFIT4: Search system and an option to add favorite rentals will help your guests to save your apartment in different categories. That way they can easily remember your apartment and recommend it to other people.
en.ADD-PROPERTY-SHORTLEASE-SECTION-BENEFIT5: We have advanced advertising system and great visibility. Our online presentations offer a unique virtual tour of the property. We have search and booking systems and professional customer service.
en.ADD-PROPERTY-SHORTLEASE-SECTION-BENEFIT6: Investing in furniture and amenities will pay off, as guests value comfort and beautiful interior. If you provide all necessary elements in your short-term rental and add a little extra touch to make your guests feel welcome, you can expect a high turnover of your initial investment quite soon.

en.ADD-PROPERTY-SHORTLEASE-SECTION-TEXT: Short-term rental is a fully furnished property leased for a short period of time. Short-term rentals are often more affordable than hotels. They also offer more space, a possibility to cook and store food, and an opportunity to taste the local culture. This is the most popular choice for tourists, world travelers, and those traveling for work. In order to lease your apartment or a house as a short-term rental, you need advanced advertising and detailed information about fixtures and fittings. We offer both, and additionally, we offer support of a online agent for all additional questions.

en.CAREER-ABOUT-US-TEXT: City Expert is an online real estate agency that uses the latest technology, creative marketing solutions, and advanced online presentations. We are dedicated to one idea – to modernize and simplify the world of real estate. That's why we built an online model, where agents switch field work for an office. By going online, our agents can do what they know the best – negotiate the price and offer support. Everything we achieved so far we owe to our people. We are a team of creative, innovative and enthusiastic individuals. If you share our visions, join us, to bring the real estate to the future.

en.COOKIE-BAR-TEXT: This website uses cookies. If you want to know more about the concept of cookies and how to turn them off, see the Cookie Policy. By continuing to use this website, you consent to our use of these cookies.
en.COOKIES-BANNER: We use cookies to personalize content and ads, provide social media features, and analyze traffic to our website. By using our services, you agree to the use of cookies.
en.COOKIES-PAGE-BY-USING-OUR: By using our Site, you are consenting to our use of cookies in accordance with this Cookie Policy. If you do not agree to our use of cookies in this way, you should set your browser settings accordingly or not use our Site. If you disable the cookies that we use, this may impact your user experience while on the our Site, for example you may not be able to visit certain areas of our Site or you may not receive personalized information when you visit our Site.
en.COOKIES-PAGE-IF-YOU-USE: If you use different devices to view and access our Site (e.g. your computer, smartphone, tablet etc.) you will need to ensure that each browser on each device is adjusted to suit your cookie preferences.
en.COOKIES-PAGE-MOST-INTERNET-BROWSERS: Most internet browsers are initially set up to automatically accept cookies. You can change the settings to block cookies or to alert you when cookies are being sent to your device. There are a number of ways to manage cookies. Please refer to your browser instructions or help screen to learn more about how to adjust or modify your browser settings.
en.COOKIES-PAGE-TWO-TYPES-OF: Two types of cookies may be used on our Site - 'session cookies' and persistent cookies'. Session cookies are temporary cookies that remain on your device until you leave the Site. A persistent cookie remains on your device for much longer or until you manually delete it (how long the cookie remains on your device will depend on the duration or 'lifetime' of the specific cookie and your browser settings).
en.COOKIES-PAGE-WE-USE-COOKIES: We use cookies to make our Site easier to use and to better tailor the Site and our Services to your interests and needs. Cookies may also be used to help speed up your future activities and experience on our Site. We also use cookies to compile anonymous, aggregated statistics that allow us to understand how people use our Site and to help us improve their structure and content. We cannot identify you personally from this information.

en.FAQ-AFTER-I-BOUGHT-APARTMENT: At which point are utility bills transferred in my name after buying an apartment?
en.FAQ-AFTER-I-BOUGHT-APARTMENT-1: When you buy an apartment, no matter if you are registered as the new owner or not, utility bills, electricity bills and phone bills won't be automatically transferred in your name, it will still be registered in the name of the previous owner.
en.FAQ-AFTER-I-BOUGHT-APARTMENT-2: Therefore, it is necessary to visit the nearest office of the PUC “Infostan”, energy and fixed line operators after you certify the agreement. You need to bring a copy of the agreement and present the original for inspection, and apply for change of the user.
en.FAQ-APARTMENT-IS-IN-PROCESS: The apartment is in the process of legalization. Can I sell it via your company?
en.FAQ-APARTMENT-IS-IN-PROCESS-1: Real estate that is not registered in the Real Estate Cadastre can be traded with, and it is possible to sell it the same as a registered real estate. However, it is much harder to sell such real property, because the ownership transfer process is far more complicated.
en.FAQ-APARTMENT-IS-IN-PROCESS-2: City Expert Global LLC examines the Proof of Ownership Documents before executing any Agreement, on which occasion the client is informed on their validity and quality. If it is determined that the documentation is of poor quality, hence the buyer would not be able to register himself as the owner, or it would cause him great difficulties, our company will not mediate in the sale of such an apartment, but we will offer the service of advertising the apartment for sale.
en.FAQ-APARTMENT-IS-IN-PROCESS-3: If the company mediates in order to sell the real property that is not registered, or not registered in the name of the principal, i.e. our client, this will be noted in the ad on our website
en.FAQ-APARTMENT-IS-IN-PROCESS-4: For all of the above, we recommend you to take all the steps in order to regulate the legal status of your apartment before hiring a broker for selling the apartment, because it will make finding a buyer much more simple, and the value of registered real property is much higher than the value of unregistered one.
en.FAQ-BROKING-CONTRACT-1: This Agreement regulates the rights and obligations of the Parties, i.e. rights and obligations of the broker and the client (the lessor and/or the lessee).
en.FAQ-BROKING-CONTRACT-2: The brokerage contract in addition to the rights and obligations of the broker and the client also contains information of the broker and the number under which it was entered in the Register, the originator, the type and the essential elements of a legal transaction
en.FAQ-BROKING-UNDER-CONTRACT-1: Sub-brokerage means using the services of our partnership companies for the purpose of presenting properties to prospects, in case the broker is unable to present them himself. It is used for prompt and easier finding of the ideal lessee (In our case, sub-broker only presents the property, so the owners have no additional expenses).
en.FAQ-BTQ-CANT-FINT-THE-APARTMENT-I-LIKE-H: I can't find the apartment I like. What now?
en.FAQ-BTQ-CANT-FINT-THE-APARTMENT-I-LIKE-T: Upon registration, you will have the option to save your search and all parameters you used. When you save your search, you will activate the email alert option. When there is a new property available, that meets your criteria, you will receive a notification about it by e-mail. This way, you will find out about the new property first and you won't have to go through the search process again.
en.FAQ-BTQ-DIDNT-RECEIVED-ANY-CONFIRMATION-: I didn't receive any confirmation for the property viewing. What should I do?
If you don't receive confirmation for the property viewing, please give us a call on 011 44 26 000, or  using the contact form on the website, so we can send you the confirmation as soon as possible.
en.FAQ-BTQ-HOW-TO-REGISTER-TEXT: The "Register" option is located in the upper right corner of our site. Here you can fill in the registration form. If you don't register in this way, you will receive a registration request when you send a viewing request or when you use advanced options on our site.
en.FAQ-BTQ-IS-MY-DATA-SAFE-TEXT: We guarantee the security of your data. We verify your information using a software. That means that your data is safe and that there is no possibility of misuse. In accordance with the Law on Personal Data Protection, we have adopted the Ordinance on Personal Data Protection and manage the data collection, which is registered under the number 164-00-00018/2016-07 at the Commissioner for information of public importance and personal data protection.
en.FAQ-BTQ-SELL-PROPERY-WITHOUT-COMMISSION-: How can it be that you sell/lease properties without commission?

As office work saves much of their time, our agents have the ability to process more requests. That makes our entire online business model cost-effective. Also, the commission is charged from the property owners who advertise their properties on our site.
en.FAQ-BTQ-WHO-CAN-I-TALK-TO-FOR-MORE-INFO-: Who can I talk to for more information about the property?

When you schedule a viewing you will get the property owner’s contact information. Feel free to ask them anything you want. Our agents will be available for all additional questions about the property, sale and lease process.
en.FAQ-BTQ-WHY-DO-I-NEED-TO-VERIFY-MY-ACCOU: Why do I need to verify my account?

The Law on the Prevention of Money Laundering and Financing of Terrorism ("Official Gazette of the Republic of Serbia" No. 113/2017), to which we oblige as a broker in the sale and leasing of immovable property, stipulates in Article 17 that while entering into a business relationship with any person we must check and identify the person's personal document. The provision of Article 7 of the same Law prescribes our obligation to refuse to do business with a person whose identification we cannot verify in accordance with this Law. The obligation to provide data is specified in the Terms of use of the City Expert web portal published on the website

, and which are fully in accordance with the Law on Prevention of Money Laundering and Financing of Terrorism ("Official Gazette of the Republic of Serbia", No. 113/2017) and the Law on Personal Data Protection ("Official Gazette of the Republic of Serbia", No. 97/2008, 104/2009 - other law, 68/2012 - decision US and 107/2012.
en.FAQ-BTQ-WHY-I-NEED-TO-REGISTER-HEADER: Why do I need to register?
en.FAQ-BTQ-WHY-I-NEED-TO-REGISTER-TEXT: As a registered user, you have the option to access all our services. This way you can get in touch with property owners and schedule a viewing of the property.
en.FAQ-CLAUSULA-INTABULANDI: What is clausula intabulandi and why do I need it?
en.FAQ-CLAUSULA-INTABULANDI-1: it is a provision of the real property sale agreement, without which you can not be registered in the Real Estate Cadastre as the new owner upon purchasing the real property.
en.FAQ-CLAUSULA-INTABULANDI-2: This provision represents an approval of the previous owner to register yourself as the new owner in the Cadastre.
en.FAQ-CLAUSULA-INTABULANDI-3: This approval is often given under certain conditions, which are primarily related to the certificate of the paid purchase price.
en.FAQ-CLAUSULA-INTABULANDI-5: “The seller agrees that the buyer can, on the basis of this agreement and the confirmation on transfer of funds (the purchase price) issued by the Bank, be registered as the sole owner of the real property, without his further presence, particular approval or subsequent authorization (clausula intabulandi).”
en.FAQ-CUSTOM-BANNER-HEADER: Didn’t find what you are looking for?
en.FAQ-DEPOSIT-1: Deposit is an agreed amount of money by which the lessor provides to return the property to its original condition. In the event that, after leaving the apartment, the lessee has returned it to its original condition, the lessee will get the deposit back. In case the apartment was not returned to its original condition, the lessor has the right to withhold a part or the entire amount of the deposit, if a greater amount of work has to be undertaken (or if the lessee has not paid the bills). It often happens that the lessor keeps the deposit if the lessee decides to leave the premises before the agreed term expires.
en.FAQ-DIDNT-FIND-ANSWER: Didn't find answer you were looking for?
en.FAQ-DOWN-PAYMENT-1: Downpayment is an agreed amount of money by which the lessee guarantees to hire the asset, and the lessor guarantees to sublet the asset to that specific lessee. It serves as an insurance to both sides from any possible changes in subletting the asset. If the lessee withdraws from renting the apartment, the lessor gets to keep the downpayment, and if the lessor withdraws from renting, he is obliged to reimburse the lessee with the double downpayment.
en.FAQ-GQ-HEADER-24-7: What do you mean by 24/7 availability?
en.FAQ-GQ-HEADER-ONLINE-PRESENTATION: What’s included in the online presentation?
en.FAQ-GQ-ONLINE-AGNETS-NEGOTIATIONS-HEADER: How does an online agent lead the negotiations?
en.FAQ-GQ-ONLINE-AGNETS-NEGOTIATIONS-TEXT: The online agent reaches out to the property owner and the interested buyer/tenant after the property viewing. Next, the agent leads the negotiation via phone or electronically in order to find the best solution for both sides.
en.FAQ-GQ-ONLINE-AGNETS-VS-TRADITIONAL-AGEN: Why is an online agent better than a traditional real estate agent?

“Better” has multiple meanings and interpretations. If by “being better” you mean efficient, then maybe they are. However, we wouldn’t call them better. By listening to our users and following our vision we wanted to provide more efficient service without compromising the quality. That’s why we introduced the online model of business that allows us to lead the negotiations and save precious time to property owners and buyers/tenants.
en.FAQ-GQ-TEXT-24-7: Our property offers and their advanced presentations (photos, video, 360° view, and interactive floor plan) are available 24/7. That means you can find your ideal property, take a virtual tour and send a request for property viewing any time of the day (and night!), including weekends.
en.FAQ-GQ-TEXT-ONLINE-PRESENTATION: For every property listed on the website, we create an online presentation. It includes HD photographs, video, 360° view presentation and detailed description of the property and its location. We share information about a distance to public institutions, schools, supermarkets, parks and other places of public importance. Photos give you a detailed insight into the property, the video takes you on a virtual tour, and 360° view presentation gives you a real feel of the property. Also, there is the interactive floor plan – a technical drawing with photos of every room and information about room layout. This drawing is attached to photographs so you can see how each room looks like, where is located and how it’s connected to other rooms.
en.FAQ-GQ-WHAT-DOES-ONLINE-AGNETS-DO-HEADER: What does the online agent do?
en.FAQ-GQ-WHAT-DOES-ONLINE-AGNETS-DO-TEXT: The brokerage of an online agent is no different than the brokerage of a traditional agent, for in both cases negotiation is done via phone. Our online agents negotiate between interested parties in order to conclude a legal transaction. Negotiations involve price negotiation, time management for the handover of the property, advising on certain investments in the property, as well as the realization of legal and administrative processes.
en.FAQ-GQ-WHY-CANT-AGENT-BE-PRESENT-AT-THE-: Why can’t the agent be present at the viewings?

By choosing transparency as our policy, we created advanced and realistic property presentations where we have nothing to hide. Presentations will expose all details about the property so you will only confirm live what you’ve already seen online. You already know what to expect, there is no hidden catch and there are no surprises. An agent present at the location won't have much to do. To get more information about the property you can contact the owner or talk to your online agent.
en.FAQ-HOW-CAN-I-BE-SURE: How can I be sure that my personal information and information on my apartment I provided will not end up in hands of someone who might abuse them?
en.FAQ-HOW-CAN-I-BE-SURE-1: We take care of our clients' rights and interests, at any moment and upon any action we undertake. All personal information we collect are stored in the personal data file, approved and registered by the decision no. 164-00- 00018 / 2016-07 rendered by the Commissioner for Information of Public Importance and Personal Data Protection.
en.FAQ-HOW-CAN-I-BE-SURE-2: Moreover, City Expert Global LLC executes Brokerage Agreements that oblige us to keep all data and information therein, as well as other data and information concerning ways and performance of the Agreement as trade secrets.
en.FAQ-HOW-CAN-I-BE-SURE-3: Therefore, it is absolutely impossible for your data come into the possession of an unauthorized person.
en.FAQ-HOW-MANY-APARTMENTS: How many apartments can I see for free?
en.FAQ-HOW-MANY-APARTMENTS-1: Lessees do not pay for our services. Thus, you have unlimited access to all published ads on our website, and when you want to check a specific apartment, you can schedule apartment viewing, after which our employees will inform you on the viewing time, where our agent will meet you, take you to the apartment, and introduce you to the owner. You do not pay any fee for this service, and the number of apartments you can visit is not limited.
en.FAQ-HOW-MUCH-DOES-IT-COST: How much does your service cost and when do I pay for it?
en.FAQ-HOW-MUCH-DOES-IT-COST-1: If you are a lessee or a buyer, you will not have to pay us a fee. All you have to do is find a suitable apartment on our website, call us, and we will show you the apartment and connect you with the lessor.
en.FAQ-HOW-MUCH-DOES-IT-COST-2: If you are selling a real property, our broking fee amounts 2.4% of the agreed selling price, VAT included.
en.FAQ-HOW-MUCH-DOES-IT-COST-3: If you are sub-letting your real property, our broking fee amounts 60% of the agreed monthly rent (VAT included).
en.FAQ-HOW-MUCH-DOES-IT-COST-4: In both cases, you're not obligated to pay the fee in advance, but after we find you a lessee/buyer and only after you agree the terms of lease/sale with them.
en.FAQ-HOW-MUCH-DOES-IT-COST-CONTRACT: How much does it cost to certify the Agreement before a notary public?
en.FAQ-HOW-MUCH-DOES-IT-COST-CONTRACT-1: Notaries collect compensation for services rendered during the real estate purchase and sale agreement solemnization, as well as reimbursement of costs incurred in performing their duties.
en.FAQ-HOW-MUCH-DOES-IT-COST-CONTRACT-2: The compensation for services rendered by a notary public is determined by the value of the business transaction, in this specific case, the value of the real property purchase price. Please note that the basis for determining of this compensation is the market value of the real property that a notary public can determine regardless of the value that the seller and the buyer specified in the contract, if it does not reflect the market value.
en.FAQ-HOW-MUCH-DOES-IT-COST-CONTRACT-3: Notary calculates the expenses incurred in each specific case.
en.FAQ-HOW-MUCH-DOES-IT-COST-CONTRACT-4: Therefore, the most reliable way to determine the amount of an agreement solemnization is to contact the notary public who will conduct it.
en.FAQ-I-BOUGHT-APARTMENT: I bought an apartment, certified the agreement, and paid the agreed price. What should I do next?
en.FAQ-I-BOUGHT-APARTMENT-1: Once you have paid the purchase price to the seller, there are still a few steps you have to take.
en.FAQ-I-BOUGHT-APARTMENT-2: In order to become the owner of the apartment, you need to transfer the ownership in the Real Estate Cadastre. This is done by submitting a request for making changes in the Real Estate Cadastre, together with the accompanying documentation.
en.FAQ-I-BOUGHT-APARTMENT-3: Moreover, if you have agreed to pay the tax on transfer of absolute rights with the seller, it is necessary to file a tax return with the competent Branch Office of the Tax Administration within 30 days from the date of the sales agreement solemnization.
en.FAQ-I-BOUGHT-APARTMENT-4: For all these tasks, we recommend you to hire a lawyer, as these are the actions that will be most easily and most efficiently conducted by a person who is qualified for performing them.
en.FAQ-I-DONT-LIKE-YOUR-BROKING-CONTRACT: I don't like your Brokerage Agreement because it is too broad. Can we conclude a Brokerage Agreement drafted by my lawyer?
en.FAQ-I-DONT-LIKE-YOUR-BROKING-CONTRACT-1: Agreements City Expert Global LLC concludes with its clients are extensive, as you say, but for a reason - we want to define even the smallest details of the contractual relationship between us, in order to avoid any misunderstandings and potential disputes. We are aware that users of our brokerage service are used to very brief Brokerage Agreements containing only a few articles, which do not really regulate anything. However, we want for our clients to know their rights and obligations, and eventually, to turn the real estate market towards the customers, i.e. you, with a greater purpose to the process, than enormously enriching the brokers at your expense.
en.FAQ-I-DONT-LIKE-YOUR-BROKING-CONTRACT-2: All of our Agreements are standardized and cannot be changed according to the wishes of each client. On the other hand, our employees are always there to explain each of the provisions of the Agreement you may not fully understand. Also, we are willing to hear your suggestions and critiques. If assessed as useful, there is a possibility of changing our standard Agreement accordingly.
en.FAQ-I-RENTED-APARTMENT: I sublet my apartment to a lessee you found. I have duly paid the commission, but the lessees left the apartment after a week and did not pay me the rent. Who is going to compensate me?
en.FAQ-I-RENTED-APARTMENT-1: As for any damage you have suffered from the lessee, you can demand compensation from him, since he alone is responsible for it.
en.FAQ-I-RENTED-APARTMENT-2: Precisely because of the possibility of getting in such a situation, we recommend that the lease agreement is concluded in writing, on which occasion the lessee leaves his personal information so they can be entered in the agreement. That way, in case of damages, you can find him and seek compensation.
en.FAQ-I-RENTED-APARTMENT-3: Also, it is useful to agree on a security deposit upon signing the agreement, which can be retained by the lessor if the lessee causes any damage on the apartment, or does not pay the rent, bills, etc.
en.FAQ-I-RENTED-APARTMENT-4: On the other hand, in such cases, our company understands our clients. Therefore, when the lessee terminates the lease agreement in less than a month from signing it, and you have paid the brokerage fee in full, the broker can mediate in concluding a new lease agreement free of charge. However, if the lessee terminates the agreement later on, within three months from the date of signing it, and you have paid the brokerage fee in full, the broker can mediate in concluding a new lease agreement, with a fee of 39% of the agreed monthly rent, VAT included (20%).
en.FAQ-I-RENTED-APARTMENT-THAT-I-FOUND: I rented an apartment I found on your website. The lessor does not respect the contractual provisions. Who should I contact for protection?
en.FAQ-I-RENTED-APARTMENT-THAT-I-FOUND-1: The lease agreement regulates your relations with the lessor arising from the lease and in relation to the lease. Violation of contractual provisions represents the basis for contractual penalties. If you can not resolve the dispute with the lessor by mutual agreement, you will need to seek the court protection of your rights. Keep in mind that the court in whose territory the property is located has the territorial jurisdiction over the court proceedings regarding the real property lease.
en.FAQ-I-WANT-RENT: I would like to rent an apartment via your company, but I am traveling abroad soon and I will be away for some period of time. Can I authorize someone to do everything for me?
en.FAQ-I-WANT-RENT-1: Of course. It is possible to authorize any person to conclude a brokerage agreement with our company in your name and on your behalf, and to sublease your apartment.
en.FAQ-I-WANT-RENT-2: In addition, upon concluding a brokerage agreement with our company, you can authorize one or more persons to can take actions related to intermediation on your behalf, as well as to show the apartment to potential lessees, negotiate the terms of lease, take the downpayment, etc.
en.FAQ-I-WANT-TO-BUY: I would like to buy an apartment through a housing loan. What should I do?
en.FAQ-I-WANT-TO-BUY-1: First of all, you need to select a Bank that offers the best conditions. The Bank will check your creditworthiness, i.e. the possibility of getting the loan.
en.FAQ-I-WANT-TO-BUY-2: If you are able to get a loan from the Bank, and you have found the real property you want to buy, it is necessary to conclude a preliminary agreement with the seller and validate it with the competent notary public. With the preliminary agreement and complete documentation for the apartment you are buying, you can apply for the loan with the Bank.
en.FAQ-I-WANT-TO-BUY-3: Upon approval of the loan, you need to execute the real property sale agreement with the seller, and certify it with the competent notary public, and you can also certify the pledge statement signed by the seller on that occasion.
en.FAQ-I-WANT-TO-BUY-4: It is very important to know that the conditions for approval of the loan are much stricter, and the procedure is far more complex in case of buying an apartment that is not registered.
en.FAQ-I-WANT-TO-BUY-5: All of the aforementioned represents a summarized overview of the steps you need to take upon buying an apartment on credit, and it is necessary to check all the details with the Bank you are applying for the loan with.
en.FAQ-I-WANT-TO-SELL: I want to sell my apartment, but I do not know how to determine the price. How is it determined?
en.FAQ-I-WANT-TO-SELL-1: You can determine the selling price at your own discretion, and that is the right no one can deny you. While doing so, you have to pay attention to many factors from the basic ones, such as the location of the apartment, its structure, equipment, and to the smallest details that give your home its value.
en.FAQ-I-WANT-TO-SELL-2: If you feel you are inept in this, our company will provide you with the service of asset valuation by our expert appraisers. Of course, our valuation is not obligatory in any way, and we will accept your opinion as final.
en.FAQ-I-WANT-YOU-TO-FIND-ME: I want you to find me a lessee, I am willing to pay, but I do not want to sign anything. Is that possible?
en.FAQ-I-WANT-YOU-TO-FIND-ME-1: Intermediation in trade and lease of real property is regulated by the Law on intermediation in trade and lease of real property (“Official Gazette of RS”, no. 95/2013), which stipulates that intermediation is performed on the basis of a real property trade and lease brokerage agreement, concluded in writing between the principal and the broker. So, it is not possible to intermediate without a signed agreement.
en.FAQ-LEASE-AGREEMENT-1: Lease Agreement defines the rights and obligations of the lessor and the lessee. It specifies the lease period, rent and the deposit, obligations of both Parties, and procedures in case of non-fulfillment of obligations by any Party.
en.FAQ-LEASE-AGREEMENT-2: The Lease Agreement is a bilateral legal matter (contract) by which one party (lessor) undertakes to grant the other party (the lessee) the right to use an unexpendable asset or a specific property right, and the lessee undertakes to pay for such use, and return it after expiry of the lease period.
en.FAQ-MAY-I-RENT: Can I rent an apartment without an agreement?
en.FAQ-MAY-I-RENT-1: Under the Law on Housing and Building Maintenance, the lease agreement must be made in writing and contain the date and place, information about the parties, information on the apartment under lease (address and apartment number, structure and size of the apartment, devices and appliances in the apartment, and other essential features), lease duration, lease amount, payment method and deadlines, provisions on mutual obligations of the parties regarding the use and maintenance of the apartment and payment method for the costs of management and maintenance of the building, conditions for termination of the agreement, provisions on the use of other premises that are considered to be outside the apartment and that are allowed to be used with the apartment (garage, etc.).
en.FAQ-MAY-I-RENT-2: The rights and obligations of the lessee and the lessor—as well as other issues of importance for the lease that are not regulated by the Law on Housing and Building Maintenance—are regulated in accordance with the law governing contractual obligations, and the notice period provided for by the agreement can not be less than 90 days.
en.FAQ-MAY-I-RENT-3: You can draft the agreement yourself, you can hire a professional (lawyer) to do it, or you can use the draft provided by City Expert Global DOO, which you can also modify as needed.
en.FAQ-MAY-I-SELL-ON-OTHER-PLACE: Can I advertise the apartment I'm selling on another website, or sell it to a buyer I find myself?
en.FAQ-MAY-I-SELL-ON-OTHER-PLACE-1: The City Expert Global LLC Brokerage Agreement is not exclusive, and during the term of the contract you can sell the real property to a buyer you found yourself.
en.FAQ-MAY-I-SELL-ON-OTHER-PLACE-2: Also, you can advertise your apartment for sale in any media, or engage another real estate agent, but you cannot offer a price that is lower than the price you agreed with us.
en.FAQ-ON-YOUR-WEBSITE: I read that you provide insurance for apartments to clients on your website. Can you tell me what kind of insurance precisely, and how much will it cost me?
en.FAQ-ON-YOUR-WEBSITE-1: When you give trust to our company, and conclude a brokerage agreement with us for lease of your of real property, we provide you with the insurance from general risks (fire, lightning, explosion, except nuclear explosion, storm, hail, discharge of water from plumbing and sewer pipes) for a period of 12 months. Detailed terms and conditions regarding this insurance can be found on
en.FAQ-ON-YOUR-WEBSITE-2: Yes, you read well, insurance is our GIFT to you. We will arrange it with the insurance company, we will bear the premium costs. Your obligation is only to inform the insurance company and the competent authority of the Ministry of Internal Affairs or other competent authority in case any of insurance incidents occurs (within three days from the incident).
en.FAQ-OQ-ADD-ANOTHER-PHOTO-OF-PROPERTY-HEA: Can I add another photo of my property?
en.FAQ-OQ-ADD-ANOTHER-PHOTO-OF-PROPERTY-TEX: No. Our photos and their quality are recognized by our users. They are an integral part of the online presentation. We exclusively use our material to show all properties in a genuine light and to maintain the high standard we are known for.
en.FAQ-OQ-ADVERTISE-PROPERTY-WITH-ANOTHER-A: I've already signed up to advertise with another agency. May I advertise with you too?

The City Expert Global DOO brokerage agreement is not exclusive, and during its validation period, you can advertise with other agencies or the media. The only requirement is that you can not advertise your property at a price lower than the price you have listed with us.
en.FAQ-OQ-ADVERTISE-SALE-AND-RENT-HEADER: I want to advertise my property for sale, but I also want to rent it for a while. Can I advertise my property in both categories?
en.FAQ-OQ-ADVERTISE-SALE-AND-RENT-TEXT: Yes. You can advertise property in both categories. Then, only with the support of the tenants and their consent, we can continue selling the property. You need to consider privacy issues as potential buyers will want to come see the property.
en.FAQ-OQ-ARE-THER-ANY-HIDDEN-COSTS-TEXT: No. There are no hidden nor additional costs. Please note that you may have additional costs for the verification of your documents, that have nothing to do with City Expert.
en.FAQ-OQ-CHANGE-PRICE-FOR-PUBLISHED-PROPER: Can I change the price once the property is already published on the site?
Thanks to the advanced solutions of our IT sector, you can change the price yourself from your user panel.
en.FAQ-OQ-CONTINUE-TO-SELF-ADVERTISE-PROPER: Can I continue to self-advertise my property?
Yes, you can. The only requirement is that you can not advertise your property at a price lower than the price you have listed with us.
en.FAQ-OQ-CONTROL-OF-THE-SALE-LEASE-PROCESS: How will I have control of the sale/lease process?

The agent will contact both you and interested buyer/tenant. You have the absolute freedom to speak openly about the negotiation process and explicitly state your terms of sale/lease. Our agent is there for you, to support you during the entire process, for we have a common goal – to sell/lease your property.
en.FAQ-OQ-DONT-HAVE-TIME-FOR-PROPERTY-VIEWI: I don’t have time for property viewings. Can an agent come and do the viewings for me?

For those not available for property viewings we have an “open door” option. Please note that you can select this option only at the beginning and that you cannot use this option partially. If you choose the “open door” option all you need to do is leave the key with us, and we will open the door for potential buyers/tenants. You can see the price of this service
en.FAQ-OQ-HELP-ABOUT-ESTIMATION-PRICE-OF-PR: Will you help me to estimate the price of my property?

Thanks to our many years of experience, our agents have the knowledge and quality tools to estimate the value of the property, so we can absolutely help and give you a price estimation. Our goal is to sell/lease your property, and therefore we will never advise you to offer a price that is much higher than the market value. In addition, we will always advise you to offer a competitive price for your property. A competitive price must never exceed realistic expectations.
en.FAQ-OQ-HOW-LONG-WILL-YOU-ADVERTISE-PROPE: How long will you advertise my property?

We will advertise your property until we sell it or rent it. You need to think of us as your partners in this business. As partners, we must work together to successfully sell/lease the property. Therefore it's important that we have a professional relationship. You need to be open to price suggestions and negotiations, and to be ready to offer your property at the price that fits the current market value.
en.FAQ-OQ-HOW-MANY-PEOPLE-WILL-SEE-PROPERTY: How many people will see my property?
A lot! City Expert is the number one choice for buyers/tenants with over 3 million unique users.
en.FAQ-OQ-HOW-MUCH-TIME-FOR-SETUP-PRESENTAT: How much time do you need to set up a real estate online presentation?
After the photo shoot, our team will set up your online property presentation within 24 hours. It takes 24h to make the presentation and post it online so everyone can see it.
en.FAQ-OQ-HOW-ONLINE-AGENT-SELL-LEASE-PROPE: How exactly will an online agent sell/lease my property?

What really sells/leases your property is the online presentation itself. By giving users detailed insight into each room, a virtual tour that gives a real sense of the property, and listing accurate information about fixtures, fittings, costs, and location, we have already given them all information they need. Agents will verify information about potential buyers/sellers, lead the viewing and negotiation process and be there for you until the very end of the process.
en.FAQ-OQ-ONLINE-AGENCY-VS-TRADITIONAL-AGEN: Why should I choose the online agency instead of a traditional one?

If you appreciate efficiency and transparency, and if you want to sell/lease your property in a straightforward manner without hidden costs and with the lowest commission on the market, then we are the right agency for you.
en.FAQ-OQ-SUGGESTION-FOR-PROPERTY-PRESENTAT: Can I give suggestions for my property presentation?
Of course. Contact our agents and suggest changes. We are open to all ideas and suggestions that fit our terms and technical capabilities.
en.FAQ-OQ-TRYING-TO-SELL-PROPERTY-FOR-A-QUI: I have been trying to sell my property for a quite a while. How can you help me?

Our agents regularly contact property owners and potential buyers. Agents are always there for you to provide tips and suggestions for quicker sales. If you can't sell an apartment or a house for a long time, please be open to our suggestions. Agents will advise you to adjust prices, do some repairs, and tidy up your property for viewings.
en.FAQ-OQ-VIEWING-DOESNT-FIT-MY-SCHEDULE-HE: The viewing does not fit my schedule. Can I change it?
en.FAQ-OQ-VIEWING-DOESNT-FIT-MY-SCHEDULE-TE: Of course. It’s totally up to you. Our agents will help you to schedule a viewing that fits your schedule.
en.FAQ-OQ-WHAT-DO-ONLINE-AGENT-DO-HEADER: What do online agents do, since they are not present at the viewings?
en.FAQ-OQ-WHAT-DO-ONLINE-AGENT-DO-TEXT: Office job enables agents to get more done in less time. They will complete the same tasks they previously had to go to the field for, from the comfort of their office. Compared to the traditional model of business agents are now more available, because they lead negotiations via phone or electronically. In City Expert, agents work with post-production sector to ensure that your property has the best online presentation. They collaborate with marketing team to make your property visible and accessible to a large number of people. By working with the legal team, agents resolve all legal and administrative issues in the process of selling or leasing your property. Last, but not the least, agents use all their knowledge and experience to ensure the successful conclusion of the contract.
en.FAQ-OQ-WHAT-IF-I-DECIDE-NOT-TO-SELL-PROP: What if I change my mind and decide not to sell the property?

We understand that in the case of unforeseen circumstances, you can change your mind and decide not to sell the property. If you are biased about your decision then take some time to think it through. Be respectful of our time and resources that we need to make the online presentation. If you change your mind, we will take down the property from our website at no additional cost.
en.FAQ-OQ-WHAT-IS-INCLUDED-IN-THE-ONLINE-AG: What’s included in the cost of your service?

For detailed information, please see our price list. The price of our service includes making the online presentation, advertising, scheduling viewings and keeping records of property viewings, as well as negotiating and managing the sale and lease process. Also, if you select the "open door" option and leave us the key of the property, in addition to the previously mentioned services, opening the door for potential buyers/tenants will also be included in the price.
en.FAQ-OQ-WHO-WRITES-PROPERTY-DESCRIPTION-T: Our team writes the property description in order to make a better, more accurate and useful presentation. The purpose of the description is to immerse the potential buyer/tenant into the property surroundings and part of the city it's located. You can specify the details you would like us to include in the description.
en.FAQ-OWNER-DOCUMENTS-1: Proof of Ownership Documents are an important segment upon signing a Brokerage Agreement. Owner of the real property thus demonstrates he/she is the real owner, and that there is no possibility of renting the apartment to someone else. According to the Law on Brokerage, Article 23, Items 2 and 5, the lessor is obliged to provide the broker with original documents and submit copies thereof.
en.FAQ-OWNER-DOCUMENTS-2: Proof of Ownership Documents are: Certificate of Ownership, Sale and Purchase Agreement, Deed of Gift, Lifelong Care Contract, Probate Proceedings, etc. Proof of Ownership Documents do not encompass electricity or tax bills, since they don't include all the information needed. A Proof of Ownership Document has to contain the following 5 items:
en.FAQ-OWNER-DOCUMENTS-3: Name and surname of the owner who is a counterpart in the Brokerage Agreement
en.FAQ-OWNER-DOCUMENTS-7: Certification stamp (by the municipality, the court, notary, etc.).
en.FAQ-RENT-GIVING-1: Letting is an agreement by which the lessor rents an asset to the lessee

en.FAQ-SUBHEADER-TEXT: Here you can find answers to frequently asked questions
en.FAQ-TAKING-1: Hiring is an agreement by which the lessee rents an asset from the lessor
en.FAQ-TITLE-FOLLOWING-TEXT: Here you can find answers that are usually asked by our clients
en.FAQ-WHAT-DOCUMENTATION-SHOULD-I: Which documents should I provide if I want to rent an apartment via your company?
en.FAQ-WHAT-DOCUMENTATION-SHOULD-I-1: Upon concluding a brokerage agreement with City Expert Global DOO, it is essential to hand over a photocopy of your ID card (or transcript of the read chipped ID card) or your passport to our representative.
en.FAQ-WHAT-DOCUMENTATION-SHOULD-I-2: Also, when concluding the brokerage agreement, you are required to provide us with the original documents proving your rights over the real property for inspection.
en.FAQ-WHAT-DOCUMENTATION-SHOULD-I-3: Upon the conclusion of the legal matter we have been mediating in (a real property lease agreement), you need to submit us copies of all documents that prove your right over the property which is the subject of intermediation.
en.FAQ-WHAT-SHOULD-I-DO: What do I need to do in order to offer my apartment on www.cityexpert.rs?
en.FAQ-WHAT-SHOULD-I-DO-1: You are to contact our company by phone or email specified on our website. Afterwards, our employees will guide you through the procedure, step by step, from the Brokerage Agreement, to executing the Lease Agreement, i.e. the Purchase and Sale Agreement.
en.FAQ-WHAT-SHOULD-I-DO-2: City Expert Global LLC is broking for both the lessors and the lessees. Therefore, it is best to prepare the documents that prove your rights over the property before contacting us.
en.FAQ-WHEN-HAVE-I-RIGHTS: In which case do I have a right to a tax exemption upon buying an apartment?
en.FAQ-WHEN-HAVE-I-RIGHTS-1: If you are an adult citizen of the Republic of Serbia, residing in Serbia, and if you didn't have ownership or co-ownership over an apartment on the territory of the Republic of Serbia from 1 July 2006 to the date of the real property sale agreement certification, the seller from whom you are buying your first apartment meets all the requirements for tax exemption prescribed by Law on property tax, for an area of the apartment that covers up to 40 m² for you, and up to 15 m² for each member of your family household that did not have the ownership or co-ownership over an apartment on the territory of the Republic of Serbia as of 1 July 2006. Although the seller of the apartment is liable for paying this tax, the buyer usually benefits from tax exemption, since the amount of taxes is normally “passed on” to the buyer by increasing the sales price for this amount, or by agreeing that it is the buyer who pays the tax.
en.FAQ-WHEN-HAVE-I-RIGHTS-2: Under the same conditions, the first home owner is entitled to the VAT refund if the apartment is purchased from a taxpayer who sells apartments in the course of business.
en.FAQ-WHEN-HAVE-I-RIGHTS-3: In both cases, it is necessary to submit an appropriate request to the competent Branch Office of the Tax Administration, and we recommend hiring a lawyer for this matter.
en.FAQ-WHEN-MY-APARTMENT-IS-SOLD: Which taxes should I pay upon selling the property?
en.FAQ-WHEN-MY-APARTMENT-IS-SOLD-1: Income accrued from the sale of the apartment will be subject to the capital gains tax.
en.FAQ-WHEN-MY-APARTMENT-IS-SOLD-2: Capital gain or loss in terms of the Personal Income Tax Law is the difference between the sale price and the purchase price. If you sell an apartment at the same price for which it was purchased, or at a lower price, you do not pay this tax. Also, you are not obliged to pay this tax if you have not acquired the apartment prior to 24 January 1994.
en.FAQ-WHEN-MY-APARTMENT-IS-SOLD-3: The capital gains tax rate amounts 15%, and you are required to file a tax return within 30 days from the date of certification of the sales agreement with the competent notary public.
en.FAQ-WHEN-MY-APARTMENT-IS-SOLD-4: The law provides for tax exemption if the funds acquired through the sale of the real property are invested in solving your housing issue and housing issues of members of their family, i.e. your household
en.FAQ-WHEN-MY-APARTMENT-IS-SOLD-5: Moreover, the seller is required to pay the tax on transfer of absolute rights, which amounts 2.5% of the agreed price, if it is not lower than the market value. The seller is required to file a tax return within 10 days from the date of certification of the sales agreement. However, it is usually agreed for this tax to be paid by the buyer.
en.FAQ-WHEN-MY-APARTMENT-IS-SOLD-6: For all the details about filing tax returns and payments, i.e. tax exemptions, we recommend you to hire a lawyer.
en.FAQ-WHY-SHOULD-I: Why is it necessary to prove my identity to your employees?
en.FAQ-WHY-SHOULD-I-1: When we take you to see the apartment you found on our website and expressed a wish to visit, we are obliged to inform the apartment owner about the person coming to his apartment. This is quite natural, and we believe that you wouldn't feel comfortable if you did not know anything about the people coming to your apartment and inspect it in detail.
en.FAQ-WHY-SHOULD-I-2: In addition, we hereby inform you that any information we collect is stored in the personal data file, approved and registered by the decision no. 164-00- 00018 / 2016-07 rendered by the Commissioner for Information of Public Importance and Personal Data Protection
en.FAQ-WHY-SHOULD-I-3: Moreover, City Expert Global LLC executes Brokerage Agreements that oblige us to keep all data and information therein, as well as other data and information concerning ways and performance of the Agreement as trade secrets.
en.FAQ-WHY-SHOULD-I-4: Therefore, it is absolutely impossible for your data to come into the possession of an unauthorized person, and there is no reason to shun presenting us with an identification document.
en.FAQ-WHY-SHOULD-YOUR-REPRESENTATIVE: Why must your representative attend apartment viewing? Is not it easier to give me the number of the lessor so I contact him myself?
en.FAQ-WHY-SHOULD-YOUR-REPRESENTATIVE-1: It is not possible to do such a thing. In fact, it is necessary to distinguish advertising from brokerage. When we provide intermediation services to lessors, our job is to find a potential lessee that matches their instructions and wishes, enable contact between them, and mediate during their negotiations regarding the lease. So, it is a complex service that includes a series of actions that have to be undertaken before a legal matter can come to a conclusion (execution of a lease agreement).
en.FAQ-WHY-SHOULD-YOUR-REPRESENTATIVE-2: On the other hand, if we only advertise an apartment for rent, without the brokerage service, the ad will include lessors' contact details, so every interested person can get in touch with them independently.
en.FAQ-WHY-VOICE-MACHINE: Why does the call center answering machine warn me that our conversation could be recorded? Can I use your services without it?
en.FAQ-WHY-VOICE-MACHINE-1: City Expert Global LLC records conversations with its customers solely for one purpose - to improve the quality of our services. It is important for us to see where we are wrong, and where we could have done better, so that we can improve our services to your satisfaction.
en.FAQ-WHY-VOICE-MACHINE-2: In addition, if you have concluded a Brokerage Agreement with us, you can give us various authorizations via recorded conversations, in accordance with the provisions of the Agreement.
en.FAQ-WHY-VOICE-MACHINE-3: The notice you hear when you call us, saying that conversation can be recorded, is the result of our commitment to conduct business transparently.
en.FAQ-WHY-VOICE-MACHINE-4: On the other hand, we inform you that any information we collect is stored in the personal data file, approved and registered by the decision no. 164-00- 00018 / 2016-07 rendered by the Commissioner for Information of Public Importance and Personal Data Protection.
en.FAQ-WHY-VOICE-MACHINE-5: In addition, City Expert Global LLC executes Brokerage Agreements that oblige us to keep all data and information therein, as well as other data and information concerning ways and performance of the Agreement as trade secrets.
en.FAQ-WHY-VOICE-MACHINE-6: Therefore, it is absolutely impossible for recordings to come into possession of an unauthorized person or be misused otherwise.

en.ONLINE-AGENCY-LEGAL-TEAM-SECTION-TEXT: We are there for you from the beginning until the end. We provide support throughout the entire process – from the moment you want to enlist your property, or look for a new home, until the time you conclude your contract. Our legal team prepares preliminary and main contracts of sale or purchase, and drafts a model for a contract of lease.
en.ONLINE-AGENCY-MODERN-TECH-SECTION-TEXT: Our website is designed to give owners, buyers, and tenants a chance to sell, buy or rent the property from the comfort of their homes. Our advanced search allows users to choose the structure, location, and facilities of the property. We also include property descriptions and information about the location. We believe in transparent advertising so that's why we will always include maintenance costs whenever we can. The one technological advancement we are really proud of is our online presentation, recognized by users as a key element that makes City Expert different.
en.ONLINE-AGENCY-ONLINE-PRESENTATION-SECTIO: To add a property to our site you need to fill in the form. Our photographers will visit you and record every detail of your house, apartment or office space. The development team will make an interactive floor plan – a technical drawing of room layout and link it to photographs. This way, users can see how each room looks like. The video we make takes every visitor through the property as if he visited it himself. For virtual sightseeing, there is a 360° view that gives a realistic feel of the property so you can estimate the distance, see the structure and orientation of each room.
en.ONLINE-AGENCY-PERSONAL-AGENT-SECTION-TEX: Agents lead the negotiations, give you advice about estimating price, plan your budget, and help you sell, buy, lease and rent a property. Agents use their knowledge and advanced technology to answer all your questions. You can contact them by phone or electronically.
en.ONLINE-AGENCY-SECTION-TEXT: City Expert uses the best of both worlds – modern technology and the knowledge we have acquired during our days as a traditional agency. Our agents rely upon practical experience and innovative solutions that speed up the process. We are proud of our technology as it enabled us to save time and offer the best prices on the market.
en.ONLINE-AGENCY-VIEWING-WITHOUT-AGENT-SECT: The presence of an agent is no longer necessary as you will only confirm live what you saw online. There will be no unpleasant surprises as we transparently show every single detail of the property. Meet interested buyers and tenants and get to know each other. Once you form an honest relationship, you will have excellent chances of reaching an agreement. Our goal is to seal the deal together. Agents will send you notifications about scheduled viewings, changes and cancellations via SMS and email.

en.SL-EVERYTHING-PUTTING-USERS: All of them. Our focus on the customer needs is not just a phrase. We know that some locations are not desirable as downtown Belgrade accommodation, and that they may not be worth the effort. Yet, since our customers have different needs, and some of those locations will, no matter how rarely, fit those needs, for us it is more than worth all the effort. That is why our Apartment per Day register hosts accommodation in all Belgrade areas. Naturally, if those properties satisfy our high quality criteria.
en.SL-HOW-TO-RENT-FOR-A-DAY: How to rent Apartment per Day?
en.SL-IT-IS-ENOUGHT: All you need to do is to choose your Apartment per Day, apply for booking, and we will do the rest for you.
en.SL-LOOKING-FOR-APARTMENT-IN-BELGRADE: You are looking for accommodation in Belgrade, just for a day, maybe two, or a few? You prefer cosy privacy of a flat to a busy swarm of a hotel? Discretion of a private apartment is something you would never trade for a crowded hostel room? Or, you just want to spare some money on accommodation? Anyhow, this is the starting point of your Belgrade adventure! Your Apartment per Day awaits you here!
en.SL-NOTHING-SERVICE: Nothing. Our short term rental service Apartment per Day, as all other rental services on our website is completely free for renters. We build our business model in a way that every lessee can get a full insight into the apartments in Belgrade, find out all needed informations about the property, finally book it, and pay nothing. Commission we get from the property owners for completed transaction does not affect the price.

We simplified the process of finding the right short stay accommodation in Belgrade, thus saving your time and providing you the most accurate informations about the apartment you like. Also, we made renting procedure for the chosen short stay apartment quick and easy.
en.SL-WE-BELIEVE: We believe that our short term rental customers, whether renting apartment for a few hours only, for a day or a night, all deserve the same treatment as the ones that rent long term. Your vacation in Belgrade, or at least it’s part in rented flat, must be a pleasant experience.
en.SL-WILL-HELP-YOU-FIND: We will help you find an ideal place to stay the night, or have a daytime rest. There’s nothing wrong with a power nap! That diminishes surprise possibilities and ensures your full satisfaction with your vacation rentals.
